original_text: Another person might sit on the thing that she sat on. That person must wash his clothes and his body. He will be unclean until evening.
korean_text: 그가 앉은 자리를 만지는 자도 다 그들의 옷을 빨고 물로 몸을 씻을 것이요 저녁까지 부정할 것이며

sentences.original_text: on the thing that she sat on
That person must wash his clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람은 자기 옷을 씻어야 한다

sentences.original_text: He will be unclean until evening
